name: unselfconscious
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not worried about other people's opinions of you, about doing things in a particular way, or about being impressive: He danced with unselfconscious abandon. The woman sits quite still and unself-conscious, her hands cradling the book. The author evokes the little girl's un-self-conscious joy. Opposite
self-consciousRelated words
unselfconsciously
unselfconsciousness
More examplesFewer examplesShe is totally unselfconscious about her scars.He was as unselfconscious about his untidiness as about everything else.He hugged the book to himself with the unselfconscious joy of a seven-year-old. She possesses an air of unself-conscious poise. He gave his most un-self-conscious performance yet.
